data.title: Richmond, Indiana Current Local Time and Time Zone
data.meta_description: Current local time in Richmond, Indiana with information about Richmond, Indiana official time zones and daylight saving time.
data.text:
Current Local Time

Richmond, Indiana is officially in the Eastern Time Zone

The Current Time in

Richmond, Indiana is:

Wednesday

8/14/2024

7:30 AM

EDT

Richmond, Indiana

is in the

Eastern Time Zone

Time Zone

Abbreviations

Eastern Standard Time - is abbreviated as EST

Eastern Daylight Time - is abbreviated as EDT

UTC - GMT

Offset

Richmond, Indiana is GMT/UTC - 5h during Standard Time

Richmond, Indiana is GMT/UTC - 4h during Daylight Saving Time

Daylight Saving

Start Date

Richmond, Indiana starts Daylight Saving Time on

Sunday March 10, 2024 at 2:00 AM local time.
